BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title: Robert F. Nolan, Council candidate for designation and subsequent appointment by the Mayor to the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation Board of Directors to serve for the remainder of a five-year term that will expire on March 20, 2012.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Robert F. Nolan, NYC Health and Hospitals Corporation Board of Directors.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Pursuant to ยง3-212(e) of the New York City Administrative Code, the Council of the City of New York and the Mayor are empowered to jointly appoint five members to serve on the New York City Lobbying Commission.  In addition, the Council and the Mayor jointly designate a Chair from among the Commission members.  The Council will consider the appointment of Elisa Velazquez as a member of the New York City Lobbying Commission.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Elisa Velazquez, New York City Lobbying Commission.

Items.Title: Robert F. Nolan, Council candidate for designation and subsequent appointment by the Mayor to the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation Board of Directors to serve for the remainder of a five-year term that will expire on March 20, 2012.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Communication be P-C Item Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Robert F. Nolan, NYC Health and Hospitals Corporation Board of Directors.
